data.actual_result: It jumps you to created channel while QS is still open
data.expected_result: Either Quick Switcher should close after jumping to created channel, or it should keep the QS open without jumping to channel
data.short_description: When creating a channel by long pressing a server in Quick Switcher, it will make you jump to the newly created channel without closing Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Quick Switcher - In the horizontal server list at the top, long press a server where you have perms to create channels - Create a new channel
